statements: DELETE FROM defaults_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND default_flag = TRUE;
DELETE FROM defaults_data WHERE risk_score >= 700 OR loan_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM default_rates WHERE customer_id = 101 AND default_date <= '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE credit_score < 600 AND risk_level = 'high';
DELETE FROM historical_data WHERE loan_id = 101 AND default_status = TRUE
DELETE FROM risk_assessment WHERE customer_id = 100 AND risk_score < 50;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount < 1000 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
